Small dog breeds typically weigh less than 22 pounds and stand no taller than 16 inches. Examples of small dog breeds include the Chihuahua, Pomeranian, and Shih Tzu.
Small dog breeds typically weigh between 4 and 22 pounds and stand between 8 and 18 inches tall. Examples of small dog breeds include Chihuahuas, Pomeranians, Pugs, and Yorkies.
